casebody.data:
C. R. GILLILAND, EDWARD P. STRONG, and WALTER R. CLARK, as Sheriff of Broward County, Florida, v. MERCANTILE INVESTMENT & HOLDING COMPANY, a Florida Corporatoin. 20 So. (2nd) 502

January Term, 1945

January 16, 1945 Special Division A T. D. Ellis, Jr., for appellants. Arthur S. Friedman and W. G. Ward, for appellees. PER CURIAM:.

The decree appealed from is affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
